 Earlier, must have been from a different view, there was a gusher of bright orange oil and beside it, brown/silver bubbly stuff, I assume is the methane.,,and you could clearly see the top edges of the pipe opening.

 Also, those 'flanges' or 'wings' weren't there last time I looked. Is that something they are trying to attach to the opening?
